VIII.iv.4.A.5.e
.
SMC for Total SC Deafness in One Ear and Bilateral Blindness
A Veteran with total SC deafness in one ear, such as that numerically designated as “XI,” and SC blindness with
LPO or less, bilaterally, is entitled to SMC under
38 U.S.C.1114(o)
and
38 CFR 3.350(e)(1)(iv)
, or
visual acuity of 5/200 (1.5/60) or less bilaterally, is entitled to an additional half-step in the level of SMC, under the provisions
of 38 CFR 3.350(f)(2)(iv).
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section A - Special Monthly Compensation (SMC)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section A
